ygData.subject: sings offkey: getting to know you...
ygData.msgSnippet: let s see... i play on e ci sever, though i ve been debating about leaving it as i m tired of getting pressured to twink and keep up with everyone. i m against
ygData.messageBody:
let's see...

i play on e'ci sever, though i've been debating about leaving it as i'm
tired of getting pressured to twink and keep up with everyone. i'm against
twinking, though it's hard to refuse gifts ;)

i have a 24/5, wood elf (she just lost it) bard called lynnara and i love
her to pieces - she's my baby. i've kinda lost a little heart with her as i
created her to fight with my bf...but that's do. ne with and we have found
out that even as friends, we have a serious personality clash in-game.

anyways...i digress ;)

i also have a baby dark elf cleric. she's my latest toy and everyone insists
on bestowing gifts on her for some reason (might it be she looks like a
hooker?). she just hit lev 10 and is now less than a bub from 11 (gotta love
quests).

i don't play eq for the quests, the faction (though i have to with a de now
=( ), the items or even levels. everyone in my guild (lion's share) is up
in the 30s now, and i am just puttering along. hehe. i play for the social
aspect and it really is nice and relaxing then.

my guild is not one for powerleveling, camping, or anything. if someone
wants help, and someone's willing to give it - cool. mostly, it's to harrass
each other and have a fun time.

i have no best/worst moments other than i decided to practise safe fall and
leap from the top floor of the penthouse.......542 dmg with a grand total of
566 hp. *beams* i was so proud. good thing an avo wasn't on the ground
waiting for me.

irl...i'm a student for accountant and a clerk at a retail store. boring as
hell. *grins* i get paid to sit and tan, read, sew, write, sleep, etc ;) hehe.

and i can't remember what else was supposed to be mentioned but hey - i
think i ramble quite nicely.

*waves to all these awesome fems*

lynnara starspinner
agm of lion's share
bard of 24 shattered glasses

anerak
lion's share
cleric of 10 shots in the rear

eci
